formulas.description: Add the current Ad Spend Management fiel of the Contract with the one of the opportunity
formulas.name: forAdSpendMangement
sName
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!$Record.VIP__c} = true, ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Beta_user__c}, "Yes"), {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name} = "Website Hosting" ), "VIP " + {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - In-App Onboarding", IF( {!$Record.VIP__c} = true, "VIP " + {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name}, IF( {!$Record.Semi_Custom_Pod__c} = true, "SCP " + {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name}, IF( AND( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Beta_user__c}, "Yes"), {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name} = "Website Hosting" ), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - In-App Onboarding", IF( {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name} = "Website Hosting", {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - Website Implementation", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "Social Media"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - Social Media Premium+", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "On-Demand Ads"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name}, IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "Presence Copilot"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - Presence Copilot", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "AI Lead Nurture"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + "AI Lead Nurture", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "Automated Blogs"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + "Automated Blogs", IF( ISPICKVAL({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "White Label App"), {!$Record.Account.Name} + " - " + "White Label App", {!$Record.Name} + " - " + {!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Name} ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: SNameMLS
formulas.expression: IF( {!$Record.VIP__c}=true, "VIP "+ {!$Record.Account.Name} +" - "+ TEXT({!$Record.Website_Type__c}) + " - "+ {!$Record.Hubspot_Deal_ID__c} +" - " + "IDX Tool", IF( {!$Record.Semi_Custom_Pod__c}=true, "SCP "+{!$Record.Account.Name} +" - "+ TEXT({!$Record.Website_Type__c}) + " - "+ {!$Record.Hubspot_Deal_ID__c} +" - " + "IDX Tool", {!$Record.Account.Name} +" - "+ TEXT({!$Record.Website_Type__c}) + " - "+ {!$Record.Hubspot_Deal_ID__c} +" - " + "IDX Tool" ) )

formulas.name: sVarRType
formulas.expression: CASE({!Opportunity_Products.Product2.Type__c}, "Website Launches", {!$Label.ID_Service_Website_Launches}, "General", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_General}, "Content Review", {!$Label.ID_Service_Content_Review}, "Paid Media", {!$Label.ID_Service_Paid_Media}, "SEO Key Word Analysis", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_KWA}, "Social Media", {!$Label.ID_Service_Social_Media}, "MLS Implementation", {!$Label.ID_Service_MLS_Implementation}, "SEO Migration", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_Migration}, "Platform Migration", {!$Label.ID_Service_Platform_Migration}, "Property Website", {!$Label.ID_Service_Property_Website}, "Design Refresh", {!$Label.ID_Service_Design_Refresh}, "Design Change", {!$Label.ID_Service_Template_Change}, "GMB Posts", "0125f000000VvKCAA0", "SEO Optimizations",{!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_Optmizations}, "Blogs",{!$Label.ID_Service_Blogs}, "Monthly and Quarterly Reporting" , "012EY0000004JCbYAM", "On-Demand Ads", {!$Label.ID_Service_OnDemand_Ads}, "Custom Website", {!$Label.ID_Service_Custom_Website}, "Brand Identity" , {!$Label.ID_Service_Brand_Identity}, "Citations + Reputation Management", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_General}, "Link Building", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_General}, "Presence Copilot", {!$Label.ID_Service_Presence_Copilot}, "AI Lead Nurture", {!$Label.ID_Service_AI_Lead_Nurture}, "Automated Blogs", {!$Label.ID_Service_Automated_Blogs}, "White Label App", {!$Label.ID_Service_White_Label_App}, "0125f000000VvKMAA0")

textTemplates.name: bodyClosedWon
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Account.Contact__r.FirstName},


Welcome to Luxury Presence! Im excited to introduce you to your Onboarding Manager,{!$Record.Account.Implementation_Manager__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Account.Implementation_Manager__r.LastName}, cc'd on this email. He/She will be your primary point of contact going forward and will reach out to you within the next business day to schedule your welcome call. Additionally, you will be introduced to an Client Success Manager who will initiate and manage the marketing services that youve purchased.


If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to reach out to your Implementation Manager. Also, your contract is attached for your records. It was a pleasure meeting you and good luck on your launch!

Best,

{!$Record.Owner.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: emailBilling
